text:
Cell Culture
The murine macrophage cell line RAW 264.7 was purchased from ATCC (Manassas, VA). RAW 264.7 cells were maintained in RPMI supplemented with 5% FBS and antibiotic-antimycotic (1000 U/ml penicillin, 1000 µg/ml streptomycin sulfate, and 250 ng/ml amphotericin B) at 37°C. Mouse embryonic fibroblasts (MEFs) cell line lacking specific NFκB signaling subunits NF-κB p65 (p65−/− cell line) [50] were cultured in DMEM medium supplemented with 10% FBS and antibiotic-antimycotic solution.
